findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeInReward() and _getCurrentSupply() use loops to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list and evaluate total supply, respectively. If there is a long excluded addresses list, these functions may be aborted with an OUT_OF_GAS exception.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: A potential Denial of Service (DoS) vulnerability exists due to the block gas limit.
